description: This Kotlin source file defines a BroadcastReceiver that triggers notifications at scheduled times to remind users to log activities in a fitness tracking app. It handles notification permissions for Android 13+ and constructs notifications with intents to launch the main activity.

classes.name: ReminderReceiver
classes.description: A BroadcastReceiver that listens for alarm broadcasts to post reminder notifications for activity logging.

methods.name: onReceive
methods.description: Handles the broadcast event, builds and posts a notification if permissions allow.
